petitionerArgument.violatedCode: CSFRA Sec. 1707(d) and Chapter 7, Section C
petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Undue tenant hardship due to inadequate household income below AMI threshold, making banked rent increases unaffordable

petitions.reimbursement: Full refund of rent increase paid from Sept 1-Oct 9, 2022

rationale.respondentHadNotice: Yes, petition filed before increase effective date
rationale.evidenceAssessment: Tenant proved income significantly below 100% AMI threshold, landlord did not dispute income evidence
rationale.impactAssessment: Tenant's income significantly below hardship threshold, hardship expected to continue

petitions.respondent: Del Medio Manor, LLP and Calson Property Management
